course_title: Quality, Safety, and Systems Based Practice
course_description: Learners examine foundations of healthcare quality and established and emerging principles of safety science in care delivery related to patients, providers, and environment. Knowledge and skills needed to lead systems-based practice, patient safety, and quality improvement initiatives are explored.
prerequisites: NRSG 746D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1737, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: B. Robertson, Status: Open
